description.en:
AXL is Reverse ICO based on performance agency and corrects the performance culture sports ticket market,currently being exploited due to illegal expedient reselling,through the blockchain technology. 
We aim to form a clean ticket culture, where all the producers, artists, athletes and customers are able to coexist without having trouble.

AXL project aims to become a ‘key currency’ on global entertainment contents consumption market and recover the ticket market which infringes consumer’s right 
by ticket scalping and touts that sums to amount of around 17.6 billion USD.
